q1: I don't think spain will ever lose
a1: They are good, but they aren't THAT good
q2: Yes, you're right. All teams have losses, no matter how good they are.
q3: If you have bad days and good days but there is as much as possible
a3: there are always losses in games
a4: When is it a decline vs just plan sucking?
q5: Is "sucking" supposed to be a technical term for performance?
a5: No it is not a technical term for performance, it is jargon, but can be used to describe when teams always lose games.
